transcript:
Customer: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan, Shivaji namaskar, Gaurav baat kar raha tha sir IndiaMART se, kaise hain sir?
Customer: Badhiya.
Executive: Sir abhi shayad aapki baat hui hogi aapke account manager ke sath, fir aapne not satisfied ka wo diya hua hai. Matlab to jaan sakta hu sir kya issue aa raha hai jiski wajah se aapne not satisfied diya hua hai sir?
Customer: IndiaMART ke team kal se
Executive: Ji mam.
Customer: Haan, IndiaMART se, main har saal, saal bhar ka tum premium leke sabhi clear karke main de raha hu.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Usme kya ho gaya tha gaye saal mere ko premium se mere ko kya bola tha ki aap mere ko 30000 ka package le lena aapko 60000 wali jo services hai wo sab 60 ke 70 mein aapka upar wala jo package hai usme aapko lagi naam bolte hai TrustSeal.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: TrustSeal wale sab services hai na aapko wo aapko free mein di jayegi. Uske baad se wo log phone uthana band ho gaye mera, mere ko bola personal manager denge, fir baad mein maine upar complaint jab kiya to bolte aisa koi personal manager koi deta nahi hai, matlab theek hai. To matlab mera jo problems resolve karne ka tha wo problem resolve koi kar hi nahi raha tha ek saal se.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: To fir matlab kya hai mera rakh ke udhar aur upar se mera first year mein teen saal pehle mera 10-20 lakh tha usme IndiaMART mein nuksan ho gaya 20 lakh ka main complaint bhi raise kiya tha. To wo log bolte ki IndiaMART mein to wo chale gaya abhi. To matlab IndiaMART mein mera kuch nuksan hi hone wala hai to usse sath nahi rahe wo mera acha hai na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Jhoot bol ke to kaam nahi karna chahiye.
Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul aap baat sahi hai kya jhoot bol ke to nahi ho raha sir. Baki ek cheez mujhe bataye jaise abhi service mein dekh raha hu aap use kar rahe hain to abhi issue leads mein kya aa raha hai sir matlab aap use kar rahe hain saat din mein char din aapne buyleads IndiaMART pe consume kiye hai aur 30 din mein 12 din aap consume kar rahe hain. To leads mein kya issue aa raha hai ek baar aap bata payenge sir?
Customer: Are usme mera technical grade urea ka product hai barabar hai. To usme mere ko jo leads aa rahi hai na wo sab saale agriculture wali aa rahi hai jo product mera hai hi nahi.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Haan wo saal bhar se wahi resolve karne ko bol raha tha wo koi kaam nahi karna hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To fir matlab kya rakh ke service mein fir jab jab renewal ke time aata hai tab meetha meetha bol ke renewal kar lete aur uske baad mein kuch response nahi deta. To matlab mere ko rakhna hi nahi. Haan bas seedhi simple funda hai mere ko rakhna nahi.
Executive: Samajh gaya. Dekho sir main aapka product aap jo deal karte ho sir aapka basically aap technical grade urea mein karte ho sir.
Customer: Bas.
Executive: Okay aur aapke paas jo leads aa rahi hongi wo aa rahi hongi aapki matlab normal wo jo hoti hai urea wagera uski.
Customer: Haan wo wali sab aa rahi hai. To mere ko kuch aur upar se ek saal mein ek rupay ka dhandha nahi mila. Do saal lagatar do saal dhandha nahi mere ko ek rupay ka udhar se to main rakh ke karu kya. Nahi nahi bilkul aapki baat sahi hai. Dekhiye sir abhi ke liye main aapko itna bol raha hu aap main aapko ek group banwata hu aapke account manager ke sath main bhi usme rahunga aapko leads.
Customer: Ho gaya wo sab kuch ho gaya usme wo pehle bhi ho gaya group bana ke sab kuch ho gaya uske baad koi response deta nahi hai wo group mein. Usme leads wagera share nahi kar rahe hain wo log.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Nahi kuch nahi karte wo.
Executive: Okay. Fir main wahi bola aapko main ek baar lead share karaunga with saat din tak aapko leads. Aap chauthe manager aap chauthe jan ho mere ko abhi office se jab renewal ke liye mere ko naya aadmi phone karta hai. Nahi nahi renewal ke liye renewal ke liye dekho sir maine nahi bola aapne feedback diya hua tha account manager ko not satisfied ka whatsapp pe uske regarding maine. Main to tumhare side pe jaake bolne wala main usko bhi dene wala hu IndiaMART ko bhi main negative point dene wala hu. Main abhi nahi main karunga nahi.
Executive: Nahi nahi main samajh gaya dekho sir abhi main renewal ki baat hi nahi kar raha hu sir abhi jo aapka issue leads ka main usse baat kar raha hu main aapka proper ek catalog fir se design karata hu kyuki jo main dekha aapne bataya na abhi product main samajh gaya aapke paas jo leads bhi aa rahi hai mostly urea ki aa rahi hai aap usme deal nahi karte ho. To maine usme search bhi kiya hamare paas aapke matlab agar main baat karu shayad aap naam se jante ho Vadodara ke hai Srinath ji chemical wale ye matlab hamare paas leading supplier hai aur mostly inka bhi same product line hai jo aapka hai. To main inhi ka hi catalog same keywords product aapke catalog mein add karwata hu sir jisse aapke paas relevant leads aaye aur wo bola gaya tha mera catalog na designing hua na kuch hua hai pura saal chala gaya mera renewal khatam hone aa gaya kuch madad nahi kiya matlab main matlab main kya bolu batao usme. Aur mere ko bol service denge wo service denge har mahine tumko har hafte ka 15-15 minute extra denge wo bhi nahi diya kuch nahi diya.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: 15-15 leads extra denge.
Customer: Haan wo sab baat hui thi.
Executive: Okay ye kisne bola hua tha ek baar aap bata payenge matlab naam.
Customer: Are dekho abhi ek saal ho gaya sir abhi usko manager naya tha. Fir har time koi na koi naya aadmi phone kar deta fir baad mein. Jab renewal ka time aata tab koi na koi naya aa jata. Fir wo bolta ki are beta main to abhi tumhara handle account handle kar raha hu teen mahine se fir aap abhi renewal kar lo main kar lunga to har saal hota hai wo. Nahi nahi main samajh gaya last time aapka ekdum bekar hai ekdum service bekar hai aapka main aapko bolta kuch kaam ka nahi service.
Executive: Okay sir. To main dekhiye main isiliye aapki baat ho sakta hai dekho sir aap satisfied bilkul aapke agree kar raha hu sari baat jo leads relevant nahi hai aapko team ne aisa commitment kiya fulfill nahi kiya to bilkul aapke agree. Aap mere jagah pe khade ho aur wahi aapke IndiaMART se aapko 20 lakh ka nuksan bhi hua hai aur teen saal se ek rupay ka dhandha nahi hai to aap kya kis hisab se aap karoge rakhoge. Nahi nahi bilkul main agree kar raha hu sir main bol hi raha hu aap bilkul aap agree ho apni baat se sahi jo team ne jo commit kiya wo pura nahi kiya business bhi nahi mil raha aap time bhi de rahe ho to fir koi fayda nahi hota main isiliye dekho main aapko isliye main aapko isliye main renewal ke liye bhi nahi bol raha hu ki renew aap karao main aapko sirf itna bol raha hu main aapka pehle catalog redesign karata hu proper jaise apne add karke main catalog correct karata hu aapko leads whatsapp pe bhejo aap uska turant feedback mujhe dijiyega main ye bas aapse ja raha hu jaise aapko main agar per day ek lead bhijwa raha hu to aap leads pe connect karke us feed ka usi group mein feedback dijiyega ek hafte tak to jisse agar relevant lead hongi to aapke paas us tarah ki leads aana automatic shuru ho jayengi nahi hogi to main usko correct karaunga within week kyuki ab to IndiaMART mein aapko batau already AI pe chal raha jis tarah ki leads aap consume karte hain uska pattern set ho jata automatic us tarah ki leads aapke paas aana shuru ho jati hai sir. To ye har dam usi group mein leads bhijwaunga bas ek week tak bhijwaunga jisse aapka pattern set ho jaye relevant leads aana shuru ho jaye to aap consume karo automatic aapke paas aana shuru ho jayega fir aap use aapka bhi lagega haan chalo kuch kaam hua hai to man bhi lagega aapka kaam karne mein fir IndiaMART se. Dekhte hain agar aap abhi wo usme karke dikhao. Bilkul bilkul main pehle aapka catalog correct karwata hu aur group mein create karke aapko leads wagera share karta hu bas usme feedback dijiyega aap mere ko har lead ka ki kya uska feedback hai. Okay. Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART's services.

- Promised TrustSeal services not provided.

- Leads are irrelevant to the product category.

- Experienced financial loss due to IndiaMART.

- Lack of resolution to issues.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the issues.

- Agreed to redesign the catalog.

- Will share relevant leads in a group.

- Requested feedback on leads for a week.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will correct the catalog.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, catalog, redesign, refund, irrelevant leads
